attributes.action: Grant an interest free loan to all people wishing to move house and cant afford the huge deposits demanded. The loan to be up to 40% of the value of the property which they are buying, secured against that property by the governement and repayable interest free after 5 years or added at that stage to the mortgage. The funds should not be restricted in their use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
